name: Covid, innit
description:
Click and drag to move your cells. Cells nearer the middle of your click will move faster.

PLAY COVID, INNIT ON GITLAB PAGES
https://ket-game-studios.gitlab.io/compsoc-gamejam-12-2020/

Our game is quite large (50MB), please be patient loading! Plays best in Chrome.

Play as a horde of virus cells as you infect the blobs and take over the world! Navigate your cluster through obstacles in your way: avoid the disinfectant spray & masks, dodge the 'Clap for carers', and escape your own lockdown insanity to infect the blobs on each level. Follow your progress over the months of the year with the news headlines and case tracker!

This game was built by Tobias Dorra, Luca Vazzano and Jack Webb, in 48 hours, as part of Aber CompSoc GameJam 2020. You can view the source code on GitLab.

Not all months are implemented yet - so far you can play through January, April, July, August, November, and December.
